summary: On a distant planet inhabited by mutants, two bounty-hunters race to rescue three Earth female captives from the clutches of an evil mutant warlord.
cast: Peter Strauss|Molly Ringwald|Ernie Hudson|Andrea Marcovicci|Michael Ironside|Beeson Carroll|Hrant Alianak|Deborah Pratt|Aleisa Shirley|Cali Timmins|Paul Boretski|Patrick Rowe|Reggie Bennett|Colin Mochrie|Harold Ramis
keywords: camp|3d|low budget sci fi movie|dictator|sword and planet
title: Cazador del espacio: Aventuras en la zona prohibida
